lead_paragraph: After one, last, unforgettable, 60-point night, the fans of Los Angeles will have to get used to life without Kobe Bryant. It's something many of them have never known.

headline.main: LA Fans Consider Bryant's Last Days, and Life Without Him
headline.print_headline: LA Fans Consider Bryant's Last Days, and Life Without Him
